mapper.insert: insert into passenger (passen_id, user_id, order_id, passen_linsen, passen_name, passen_type, passen_ltype) values (#{passenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passenLinsen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passenLtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update passenger set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passen_linsen = #{passenLinsen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passen_name = #{passenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passen_type = #{passenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passen_ltype = #{passenLtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where passen_id = #{passenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select passen_id, user_id, order_id, passen_linsen, passen_name, passen_type, passen_ltype from passenger
select passen_id, user_id, order_id, passen_linsen, passen_name, passen_type, passen_ltype from passenger where user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_id="未预定"
select passen_id, user_id, order_id, passen_linsen, passen_name, passen_type, passen_ltype from passenger where passen_name like"%"#{passen_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and order_id="未预定"
